Samantha Biography

Awards Hit-Songs About

Samantha Akkineni

Samantha is a brilliant Telugu and a Tamil actress. Her acting is flawless. She perfectly fits into any character given.

She predominantly works in Tamil and Telugu films.Her actual name is Samantha Ruth Prabhu but after her marriage, she is mostly called Samantha Akkineni. Her nicknames are Sam, Yashoda and Yasho.

Here, I am going to share with you the list of his movies, personal life, achievements and many more.

Profession : Actress and model

Awards

Behindwooods Gold Medals

Behindwooods Gold Medals 2017 People Choice Winner ( Female ) was won by Samantha for her role in Theri & 24.
The People Choice Winner is chosen by highest the number of votes from general public among various other candidates. Samantha received the Gold Medal from Nivin Pauly.
